mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT l.name AS location ,aa.`time`,l.id AS locationId ,aa.type_id AS typeId,aat.name AS typeName FROM t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON a.`id` = aa.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN t_location l ON l.`id` = aa.`location_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment_type aat ON aat.id = aa.type_id WHERE a.`id` = #{activityId} AND a.`del_flag` = 0 AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY aa.`type_id`,aa.`time`,l.`id`

SELECT DISTINCT aa.id AS activityAssignmentId,ts.`id` AS `timeSlotBo.id`,ts.`begin_time` AS `timeSlotBo.beginTime`,ts.`end_time` AS `timeSlotBo.endTime` FROM t_location l LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON l.`id` = aa.`location_id` LEFT JOIN t_time_slot ts ON ts.`id` = aa.`time_slot_id` WHERE l.id = #{locationId} AND aa.time = #{time} AND aa.activity_id =#{activityId} AND aa.type_id = #{typeId} AND ts.`del_flag` = 0 AND aa.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT aa.`id` AS activityAssignmentId, a.name AS activityName,ts.`begin_time` AS timeSlotBegin,ts.`end_time` AS timeSlotEnd,l.`name` AS location,aa.`time` AS date ,a.`id` AS activityId,aat.name AS type FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_activity a ON aa.`activity_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN t_time_slot ts ON ts.`id` = aa.`time_slot_id` LEFT JOIN t_location l ON l.`id` = aa.`location_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment_type aat ON aat.`id` = aa.`type_id` WHERE aa.`id` = #{activityAssignmentId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_post_assignment pa ON pa.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` LEFT JOIN t_scheduled s ON s.`post_assignment_id` = pa.`id` WHERE aa.id IN ( SELECT aa.`id` FROM t_activity_assignment aa WHERE (aa.`time_slot_id`,aa.`time`) = (SELECT aa.`time_slot_id` ,aa.`time` FROM t_post_assignment pa LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON aa.id = pa.`activity_assignment_id` WHERE pa.`id` = #{postAssignmentId} ) AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ) AND s.`user_id` = #{userId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT a.`name` AS activityName,aa.`time` AS activityDate,ts.`begin_time`,ts.`end_time`,p.name AS postName,l.`name` AS locationName,aat.`name` AS activityTypeName FROM t_post_assignment ps LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON ps.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` LEFT JOIN t_activity a ON a.id = aa.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN t_time_slot ts ON ts.`id` = aa.`time_slot_id` LEFT JOIN t_post p ON p.id = ps.`post_id` LEFT JOIN t_location l ON l.id = aa.`location_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment_type aat ON aa.`type_id` = aat.`id` WHERE ps.id = #{postAssignmentId}
